1. It is unbelievable how, just like yesterday, you were a little, bubbly child. Today, you’re celebrating your birthday as a respectable teenager. I’m proud of who you’ve become, sweet daughter. Happy birthday. 

2. Happy birthday, cutie. It isn’t often that a dad will have a daughter who he relates with as a man to his fellow man. You’re an express gift from God, my dear daughter, and I wish you heaven’s best in this your new year 

3. Today, I just wish you many years of pure bliss unfanthomable joy, indescribable peace and priceless achievements. Happy Birthday , my love. 

4. We wish you a birthday that is as beautiful, incredible, and unique as you are. Happy birthday daughter! 

5. You are such a positive, charming, and absolutely adorable daughter. I am so proud that I get to call you my daughter because no other person could ever hope to compare to you. Happy birthday to my perfect little girl! 

6.You renew my faith in the world because any world that has as incredible a person as you in it is one that can only be good. You are such an inspiration to me, and I hope you feel surrounded by love and warmth on your birthday. 

7. I never knew I could love something so tiny so much, but the day you came into my life I was overwhelmed by all the love I had for you. Thank you for showing me how wonderful being a parent is. Happy birthday to my darling daughter! 

8.From the day you first came home from the hospital, you ruled our house like a tiny little tyrant. Now, on your birthday, we get to treat you like the queen you are. Happy birthday from your loyal subjects a.k.a. your parents!


9. When you were little, you were never afraid to give me tons of kisses, but now you seem so embarrassed! As a parent, it is my duty to embarrass you as much as possible, so this year I plan to smother you with hugs and kisses in front of all your friends. You are so welcome. 

10. Daughter, you’ve achieved so much in life, and I’m nothing but proud of the woman you’ve become. May your year be filled with continued success and never-ending love. I’ve got that love part covered!
